cards.name: Summoning Ritual #1
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge your highest-Power destroyed card with Dormammu to continue the ritual. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Summoning Ritual #2
cards.ability: On Reveal: Dormammu steals 1 Power from EACH other card here to continue the ritual. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Summoning Ritual #3
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy 2 of your other cards here to summon Dormammu. (Banish this.)

cards.name: Ultron Mind Stone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

cards.name: Ultron Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.
